definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: In this paper, the loudspeaker array in the public address system is described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述扩声系统用的扬声器组阵。

sentences.english: Direct playback music on any sound-system or speaker.
sentences.chinese: 直接在扬声器或播放器自动播放音乐。

sentences.english: Dr. Shatzel’s face appeared on screen, and his voice issued from a speaker.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸显示在屏幕上，声音从一个扬声器中传出来。

sentences.english: To design a loudspeaker cross-over network by using an electronic computer is a new moron.
sentences.chinese: 采用计算机设计扬声器分频网络是一种新的设计手段。

sentences.english: The performance is broadcast on high-fidelity speakers and high-definition television.
sentences.chinese: 表演在高保真度扬声器和高清晰度电视上播送。

sentences.english: Her voice over the loudspeaker was distorted.
sentences.chinese: 她通过扬声器说话的声音失真了。

sentences.english: Of course we use a loudspeaker with a sensitivity as high as possible.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们要用灵敏度尽可能高的扬声器。

sentences.english: The organic powersupply circuit is located under the piezo film speaker to reduce surface area.
sentences.chinese: 为减少表面积有机电源电路位于压电薄膜扬声器下面。

sentences.english: Next to the speakerphone is a fat daily planner bookthey keep full of things for me to get done.
sentences.chinese: 扬声器旁边是一厚本记着我每天要干什么的工作簿。

sentences.english: ACOUSTIC ENERGY speaker system introduced in 1993.
sentences.chinese: 声能扬声器系统于1993年推出。

sentences.english: Each loudspeaker has a rear facing subwoofer.
sentences.chinese: 每个扬声器有一个面朝后的低音炮。

sentences.english: The police on duty tried to shoo away the crowd by using a loud-speaker.
sentences.chinese: 在值班的警员试着把人群散去，于是他使用了扬声器。

sentences.english: Panasonic Electronic Devices Co. , Ltd. mainly produces speakers.
sentences.chinese: 松下电子部品主要生产扬声器。

sentences.english: The exciter could select loudhailer or gas flow of injector.
sentences.chinese: 激励源为扬声器或者喷嘴气流。

sentences.english: Minutes later, more word came over the transom.
sentences.chinese: 数分钟后，墙上的扬声器传来更多的消息。

sentences.english: When an amp and speaker are working synergistically, a more complete action is possible.
sentences.chinese: 当功放和扬声器的工作协同，更完整的行动是可能的。

definition: loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
